title: Riot have finally killed mordekaiser.
body:
> Mordekaiser's title is now "The Lord of Death" rather than "The Master of Metal".


Good job riot, you accomplished the goal you set months ago. You've fucking killed mordekaiser and replaced him with some generic piece of shit story-wise with a garbage and broken kit ingame.


Morde is fucking dead. What the fuck is wrong with you, riot?

I feel so fucking bad for the mordekaiser mains, I didn't even used to play morde and even I'm offended by this garbage.

Hue.

Y'know, I see you all over the place on the forums in the wake of the Mordekaiser debacle, and I've this to lay bear as someone who disliked Mordekaiser, for what little it may mean to come from someone unknown such as myself:

You have all that my empathy can spare, and I sympathize with your position and pain. I didn't like him, but that doesn't mean I actually wanted him to be removed like he was, or even at all. Yet, he was. Unless this title change is reverted, the Morde we once knew is gone, completely and utterly. His core function is no longer what it once was, his core identity has been removed and shifted; even his core strengths were changed. They left nothing in the wake of this, save the names of the abilities being named after various Metal staples, and even then they now no longer fit in or make sense. They unceremoniously removed him in a way that no one asked for, and then they expected you guys to actually put up with it, and further modifications from his original design. 

Cassiopeia, for all her rework was loathed, at least kept some of her actual playstyle from before the rework, and didn't competely 100% remove any semblance of her previous identity, nerfed though it was and now is. This update did pretty much exactly that for Mordekaiser. That's abominable and loathsome. 

My apology is nothing on their actions, for I had no hand in it, but: I am sorry for this whole ordeal. The only good to come of this is to get to read the posts of someone who can properly lay out the pain and anguish felt by Mordekaiser mains for this who can put into words the problems of this whole deal better than most. I just wish it was under more glad tidings that I could see them.

I'm a little surprised and saddened by how Riot is treating Morde. I don't play him, but he is iconic in the sense that we know who he is and the potential danger he has always posed. He always broke the 4th wall, always seemed aware of every advantage he could take, and even the Twisted Treeline altars know he's bad news. It's almost as if none of the past Mordekaiser matters to Riot. It's almost as if Riot doesn't care that we care, OR AT LEAST IT FEELS THAT WAY. 

How many more threads and protests are we going to need in order to inform Riot that we want our Metal Man to stay Metal and retain the only identity he has left? They already vastly changed his role and his kit; they've made him effectively a different champion. 

Why do they have to do this change given everything else they have already done? Who is calling the shots on these changes and why do they keep acting like they are making SERIOUS considerations when it's obvious the players who care are not being considered?
All that's left is the Visual "Update" to make him no longer a walking suit of armor.
